title.text: Most smartphone owners are taking some steps to secure their device, though fewer are especially diligent % of smartphone owners who say they use/update the following for their phone (i.e., 22% of smartphone owners use a screen lock to access their phone and regularly update phone's apps and operating system)

models.name: - No screen lock, never updates apps/Os
models.text_label: - No screen lock, never updates apps/Os

models.name: Screen lock, updates apps/OS, but only when convenient
models.text_label: Screen lock, updates apps/OS, but only when convenient
